name: SoundsOdd
0:
”Alexa, Open Sounds Odd”
”Alexa, Open Sounds Odd and Play a New Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sounds odd
des:
Sounds Odd is a fun game for children in early years. Listen for the odd sound and repeat it back to Alexa to score that round. Games consist of 10 questions.

Sounds Odd is a game focused on the starting sounds for words, eg "cuh" for cat, camp, cup etc.
Each question will add a word which doesnt fit with the other 3 words, try and guess which one is the odd one out.

Games consist of 10 rounds so children can score out of 10.

Each game consists of random questions, new questions are being added.

Please give feedback with your experience as this is greatly appreciated.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
